export const startDemoSession=()=>{const demoStartTime=Date.now();localStorage.setItem('demoStartTime',demoStartTime.toString());localStorage.setItem('isDemoMode','true');};export const checkDemoExpiry=()=>{const demoStartTime=localStorage.getItem('demoStartTime');const isDemoMode=localStorage.getItem('isDemoMode');if(!isDemoMode||!demoStartTime)return false;const currentTime=Date.now();const elapsedTime=currentTime-parseInt(demoStartTime);const fiveMinutes=5*60*1000;// 5 minutes in milliseconds
return elapsedTime>=fiveMinutes;};export const clearDemoSession=()=>{localStorage.removeItem('demoStartTime');localStorage.removeItem('isDemoMode');};export const isDemoMode=()=>{return localStorage.getItem('isDemoMode')==='true';};
